title: Kadoyng
creator_credit: Children's Film Foundation, Roy Simpson and Ian Shand
brief_description: An astronaut from the planet Stoykoil crash lands near a village byway and uses his paranormal powers and magic formula to help some children stop a motorway being built through their village. Written by Leo Maguire; electronic music by Edwin Astley. Starring Leo Maguire as Kadoyng.
